alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 2:04PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations below 6000 feet of 3 to 6 inches, except 6 to 18 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will create blowing and drifting snow at all elevations. * WHERE...The Sun Valley area * WHEN...From 5 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
